fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e3.equipments.heater.sil

Interface HeaterOperationI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeaterElectricityModel, HeaterStateModel, HeaterTemperatureModel

    public interface HeaterOperationI
    The interface HeaterOperationI declares operations that can be executed on a simulation model used in the heater SIL simulation.

    Description

    The declared operations are used in events that are propagated among the simulation models, hence implemented in each of them according to the semantics of the events on each model.

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2022-10-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void doNotHeat()
      make the thermostated heater stop heating; this internal method is meant to be executed by the heater thermostat when the room temperature comes over the target temperature after a period of heating.
      default void heat()
      make the thermostated heater start heating; this internal method is meant to be executed by the heater thermostat when the room temperature is below the target temperature.
      default void startHeater()
      start the heater.
      default void stopHeater()
      stop the heater.
